season.name: season
season.description: select a season for the guide

realms.name: realms
realms.description: directly search for a base spirit`s tree/location

RESPONSES.NO-SPIRITS: Eden doesn't have any spirits, they do not like scary places.
RESPONSES.INVALID-CHOICE: Invalid choice or Guide yet to be updated
RESPONSES.INVALID_SEASON_VALUE: Invalid Season! Couldn't find a season with the key `{{VALUE}}`

RESPONSES.NO_DATA: No data found for {{VALUE}}! If you think this is an error, please let us know via {{COMMAND}}

FIELDS.SUMMARY_DESC_NO_ELIGIBLE: This spirit is not eligible to return as a TS yet, and will become eligible when the season after the {{SEASON}} ends!
FIELDS.SUMMARY_DESC_NO_VISIT: This spirit has not returned yet, when they do return, they'll offer the same items offered during the season but in a restructured friendship tree.

RESPONSES.INVALID_DATE: Invalid date format (`{{DATE}}`). Please enter the month and year in this format: MM-YYYY (e.g. 01-2022)

SHARDS.name: shards
SHARDS.description: Get the a specific shard information

DATE.name: date
DATE.description: The date to get the shard information

RESPONSES.INVALID_DATE: Invalid date format. Please use the YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g, `2024-09-13`). Max input : **275760-09-12**
RESPONSES.DATE_NONEXIST: {{DATE}} does not exist, please provide a valid date.

RESPONSES.NO_DATA: Oops! It seems no TS data was found, please try again later.
RESPONSES.VISITING: {{SPIRIT}} is currently visiting the realms of Sky. They will depart at {{TIME}} (in {{DURATION}})
RESPONSES.EXPECTED: {{SPIRIT}} will be visiting the realms of Sky on {{DATE}} (in {{DURATION}})

CHANNEL.description: channel where reminders should be sent

OFFSET.name: offset
OFFSET.description: how many minutes before the event should the reminder be sent.

RESPONSES.CONFIGURED_ROLE: Successfully configured `{{EVENT}}` reminders for role {{ROLE}} in {{CHANNEL}}
RESPONSES.NEXT_TIME: Next reminder for `{{EVENT}}` will be sent {{TIME}}

LIVE_UPDATES.name: live
LIVE_UPDATES.description: live shards or skytimes update with auto updating message at regular interval
LIVE_UPDATES.group-desc: live shards or skytimes update with auto updating message at regular interval

START.name: start
START.description: start live shards or skytimes update with auto updating message at regular interval

CHANNEL.name: channel
CHANNEL.description: channel where live updates should be updated

RESPONSES.NOT_GUILD: This command can only be used in a server
RESPONSES.ALREADY_CONFIGURED: {{TYPE}} is already configured in {{CHANNEL}} for this this message {{MESSAGE}}.
RESPONSES.INVALID_CHANNEL: {{CHANNEL}} is not a text channel. Please provide a valid text channel
RESPONSES.CONFIGURED: {{TYPE}} configured for {{CHANNEL}}. This message {{MESSAGE}} will be updated with relevant details.
RESPONSES.ALREADY_DISABLED: {{TYPE}} is already disabled for this server

TIMESTAMP.name: timestamp
TIMESTAMP.description: get unix timestamp for the given date

TIME.name: time
TIME.description: The time to convert (format: HH mm ss)

TIMEZONE.name: timezone
TIMEZONE.description: Your timezone in the format: Continent/City

CONTACT-US.name: contact-us
CONTACT-US.description: for suggestions/bug reports/contacting us or just anything

RESPONSES.INVALID-FORMAT: Invalid time format. Please provide time in `HH mm ss` format. (e.g: `02 12 44`)
RESPONSES.INVALID-TIMEZONE:
Invalid timezone. Please provide a correct one. Use the format: `Continent/City` (e.g, `America/Los_Angeles`).
Use this link to find your timezone if you are not sure: <https://timezonedb.com/time-zones>
RESPONSES.RECIEVED: Your message is received. Here's a preview!

LANGUAGE.name: language
LANGUAGE.description: manage preferred language for the bot's response

CATEGORY.name: category
CATEGORY.description: select a category to set the laguage for

SET.name: set
SET.description: set your/server language for the bot

options.description: select a category type to remove

RESPONSES.NO-PERM: You do not have permission(s) ({{PERMISSION}}) to set a server's language
RESPONSES.SUCCESS:
Language for {{TYPE}} set to {{Language}} succesfully, you may still see english in some places as it is not possible to translate everything. 

Please consider contrubuting to translation of this bot by visiting {{LINK}} and help us add more supported language.

Note: User level language settings will take precedence over server settings (if any).
RESPONSES.ALREADY_SET: {{TYPE}} language setting is already set to {{LANGUAGE}}
RESPONSES.ALREADY_NOT_SET: There's already no language set for {{CATEGORY}}.

RESPONSES.NO_DATA: No data found for today's daily quests. Please try again later.
RESPONSES.TIME_FRAME: Please note that it can take upto 30min-1hrs after daily resets for quests to be updated. The time frame given is just an estimate, on somedays, it can take longer than that. See how it works [here](<https://docs.skyhelper.xyz/guide/docs/commands/info#how-does-this-work>)
RESPONSES.OUTDATED: This quest is outdated. Please wait for the quests to be updated.

game.name: game
game.description: The game to view the leaderboard for

leaderboard-type.name: leaderboard-type
leaderboard-type.description: Gloabal leaderboard or server specific (default: global)

MANAGE.name: manage
